thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Kar Auction Services Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.27

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kar Auction Services Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.27
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Kar Auction Services Inc:
* KAR AUCTION SERVICES, INC. REPORTS 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.63 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.27 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 9 PERCENT TO $890.4 MILLION * SEES ‍CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $185 MILLION FOR 2018​ * SEES ‍NET INCOME PER SHARE $2.40 - $2.55 FOR 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
